trans-unit.source: IO.select peeks the buffer of IO objects for testing readability. If the IO buffer is not empty, IO.select immediately notifies readability. This “peek” only happens for IO objects. It does not happen for IO-like objects such as OpenSSL::SSL::SSLSocket.
trans-unit.target: IO.select 会查看 IO 对象的缓冲区以测试可读性。如果 IO 缓冲区不为空，则 IO.select 会立即通知可读性。这种“偷看”仅发生在 IO 对象上。对于类似IO的对象（例如 OpenSSL::SSL::SSLSocket ，不会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Symbol objects represent names and some strings inside the Ruby interpreter. They are generated using the :name and :"string" literals syntax, and by the various to_sym methods. The same Symbol object will be created for a given name or string for the duration of a program's execution, regardless of the context or meaning of that name. Thus if Fred is a constant in one context, a method in another, and a class in a third, the Symbol:Fred will be the same object in all three contexts.
trans-unit.target: Symbol 对象代表Ruby解释器中的名称和一些字符串。它们是使用 :name 和 :"string" 文字语法以及各种 to_sym 方法生成的。在程序执行期间，将为给定的名称或字符串创建相同的 Symbol 对象，而不管该名称的上下文或含义如何。因此，如果 Fred 在一个上下文中是一个常量，在另一个上下文中是一个方法，而在第三个上下文中是一个类，则 Symbol :Fred 将在所有三个上下文中都是相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: initheader are the default headers to use. Net::HTTP adds Accept-Encoding to enable compression of the response body unless Accept-Encoding or Range are supplied in initheader.

trans-unit.source: initheader must be a Hash like { 'Accept' => '/', … }, and it defaults to an empty hash. If initheader doesn't have the key 'accept-encoding', then a value of “gzip;q=1.0,deflate;q=0.6,identity;q=0.3” is used, so that gzip compression is used in preference to deflate compression, which is used in preference to no compression. Ruby doesn't have libraries to support the compress (Lempel-Ziv) compression, so that is not supported. The intent of this is to reduce bandwidth by default. If this routine sets up compression, then it does the decompression also, removing the header as well to prevent confusion. Otherwise it leaves the body as it found it.
trans-unit.target: initheader 必须是一个 Hash 像{“接受” =>“ / ”，...}，并且默认为空的散列。如果 initheader 没有密钥“ accept-encoding”，则使用值“ gzip; q = 1.0，deflate; q = 0.6，identity; q = 0.3”，因此优先使用gzip压缩来压缩压缩，优先使用无压缩。 Ruby没有支持压缩（Lempel-Ziv）压缩的库，因此不支持该库。其目的是默认情况下减少带宽。如果此例程设置了压缩，那么它也会进行解压缩，同时也删除头文件以防止混淆。否则，它将离开找到的身体。

trans-unit.source: return and break in a block exit a method. If a Proc object is generated from the block and the Proc object survives until the method is returned, return and break cannot work. In such case, return and break raises LocalJumpError. A Proc object in such situation is called as orphaned Proc object.
trans-unit.target: return 并 break 块退出方法。如果从该块生成了 Proc 对象，并且该 Proc 对象在返回该方法之前一直存在，则 return 和 break 无法工作。在这种情况下， return 和 break 会引发 LocalJumpError 。甲 Proc 在这种情况下对象被称为孤立 Proc 对象。

trans-unit.source: A Module is a collection of methods and constants. The methods in a module may be instance methods or module methods. Instance methods appear as methods in a class when the module is included, module methods do not. Conversely, module methods may be called without creating an encapsulating object, while instance methods may not. (See Module#module_function.)
trans-unit.target: 甲 Module 是方法和常量的集合。模块中的方法可以是实例方法或模块方法。当包含模块时，实例方法在类中显示为类中的方法，而模块方法则不显示。相反，可以在不创建封装对象的情况下调用模块方法，而在实例方法中则可以不创建封装对象。 （请参阅 Module#module_function 。）

trans-unit.source: A Range represents an interval—a set of values with a beginning and an end. Ranges may be constructed using the s..e and s...e literals, or with Range::new. Ranges constructed using .. run from the beginning to the end inclusively. Those created using ... exclude the end value. When used as an iterator, ranges return each value in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Range 表示的间隔a和开始和结束的一组值。可以使用s .. e和s ... e文字构造范围，也可以使用 Range::new 构造范围。使用 .. 构造的范围从开始到结束都包括在内。使用 ... 创建的那些不包括最终值。当用作迭代器时，范围将返回序列中的每个值。

trans-unit.source: A TupleEntry is dead when it is canceled or expired.
trans-unit.target: 当 TupleEntry 取消或过期时，它已死。

trans-unit.source: A CSV::Writer receives an output, prepares the header, format and output. It allows us to write new rows in the object and rewind it.
trans-unit.target: 甲 CSV::Writer 接收输出，以备报头，格式并输出。它允许我们在对象中写入新行并回绕它。

trans-unit.source: A File is an abstraction of any file object accessible by the program and is closely associated with class IO. File includes the methods of module FileTest as class methods, allowing you to write (for example) File.exist?("foo").
trans-unit.target: 一个 File 是由程序访问的任何文件对象的抽象，用类关系密切 IO 。 File 包含 FileTest 模块的方法作为类方法，使您可以编写（例如） File.exist?("foo") 。

trans-unit.source: A Module is a collection of methods and constants. The methods in a module may be instance methods or module methods. Instance methods appear as methods in a class when the module is included, module methods do not. Conversely, module methods may be called without creating an encapsulating object, while instance methods may not. (See Module#module_function.)
trans-unit.target: 甲 Module 是方法和常量的集合。模块中的方法可以是实例方法或模块方法。当包含模块时，实例方法在类中显示为类中的方法，而模块方法则不显示。相反，可以在不创建封装对象的情况下调用模块方法，而在实例方法则不能。（请参阅 Module#module_function 。）

trans-unit.source: A Proc object is an encapsulation of a block of code, which can be stored in a local variable, passed to a method or another Proc, and can be called. Proc is an essential concept in Ruby and a core of its functional programming features.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Proc 对象是一个代码块，其可以被存储在局部变量，传递给方法或另一种的封装 Proc ，并且可以被调用。 Proc 是Ruby中的基本概念，也是其功能编程功能的核心。

trans-unit.source: A Psych::BadAlias exception will be raised if the yaml contains aliases but the aliases keyword argument is set to false.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Psych::BadAlias 如果YAML包含别名，但将引发异常 aliases 关键字参数设置为false。

trans-unit.source: A Psych::DisallowedClass exception will be raised if the yaml contains a class that isn't in the permitted_classes list.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Psych::DisallowedClass 如果YAML包含一类是不是在将引发异常 permitted_classes 名单。

trans-unit.source: A Range represents an interval—a set of values with a beginning and an end. Ranges may be constructed using the s..e and s...e literals, or with Range::new. Ranges constructed using .. run from the beginning to the end inclusively. Those created using ... exclude the end value. When used as an iterator, ranges return each value in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Range 表示的间隔a和开始和结束的一组值。可以使用s .. e和s ... e文字或 Range::new 构造范围。使用 .. 构造的范围从开始到结束都包括在内。使用 ... 创建的那些不包括最终值。当用作迭代器时，range返回序列中的每个值。

trans-unit.source: A Regexp holds a regular expression, used to match a pattern against strings. Regexps are created using the /.../ and %r{...} literals, and by the Regexp::new constructor.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Regexp 持有正则表达式，用于匹配串的图案。使用 /.../ 和 %r{...} 文字以及 Regexp::new 构造函数创建正则表达式。

trans-unit.target: 甲 String 对象持有并操作字节的任意序列，通常表示字符。可以使用 String::new 或作为文字创建 String 对象。

trans-unit.source: A DRbServer can be configured with an access control list to selectively allow or deny access from specified IP addresses. The main druby distribution provides the ACL class for this purpose. In general, this mechanism should only be used alongside, rather than as a replacement for, a good firewall.
trans-unit.target: 可以将DRbServer配置为访问控制列表，以有选择地允许或拒绝来自指定IP地址的访问。为此，主druby发行版提供了 ACL 类。通常，此机制只能与好的防火墙一起使用，而不是替代。

trans-unit.source: A DRbServer must be running in the local process before any incoming dRuby calls can be accepted, or any local objects can be passed as dRuby references to remote processes, even if those local objects are never actually called remotely. You do not need to start a DRbServer in the local process if you are only making outgoing dRuby calls passing marshalled parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在接受任何传入的dRuby调用之前,DRbServer必须在本地进程中运行,或者任何本地对象可以作为dRuby引用传递给远程进程,即使这些本地对象从未被远程调用。如果你只是在进行传递marshalled参数的dRuby调用,你不需要在本地进程中启动DRbServer。

trans-unit.source: A callback for additional certificate verification. The callback is invoked for each certificate in the chain.

trans-unit.source: A callback invoked at connect time to distinguish between multiple server names.
trans-unit.target: 在连接时调用的回调,以区分多个服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: A callback invoked on a server when a session is proposed by the client but the session could not be found in the server's internal cache.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端提出一个会话,但在服务器的内部缓存中找不到该会话时,在服务器上调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: A callback invoked on the client side when the client needs to select a protocol from the list sent by the server. Supported in OpenSSL 1.0.1 and higher. The client MUST select a protocol of those advertised by the server. If none is acceptable, raising an error in the callback will cause the handshake to fail. Not setting this callback explicitly means not supporting the NPN extension on the client - any protocols advertised by the server will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端需要从服务器发送的列表中选择协议时，在客户端调用的回调。在 OpenSSL 1.0.1和更高版本中受支持。客户端必须选择服务器发布的协议。如果都不可接受，则在回调中引发错误将导致握手失败。不显式设置此回调意味着不支持客户端上的NPN扩展-服务器发布的任何协议都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A callback invoked on the server side when the server needs to select a protocol from the list sent by the client. Supported in OpenSSL 1.0.2 and higher. The callback must return a protocol of those advertised by the client. If none is acceptable, raising an error in the callback will cause the handshake to fail. Not setting this callback explicitly means not supporting the ALPN extension on the server - any protocols advertised by the client will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器需要从客户端发送的列表中选择协议时，在服务器端调用的回调。在 OpenSSL 1.0.2和更高版本中受支持。回调必须返回客户端发布的协议。如果都不可接受，则在回调中引发错误将导致握手失败。不显式设置此回调意味着服务器上不支持ALPN扩展-客户端发布的任何协议都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A class variable must start with a @@ (two “at” signs). The rest of the name follows the same rules as instance variables.
trans-unit.target: 类变量必须以 @@ 开头（两个“ at”符号）。名称的其余部分遵循与实例变量相同的规则。

trans-unit.source: A class which allows both internal and external iteration.
trans-unit.target: 一个允许内部和外部迭代的类。

trans-unit.source: A collection of possibility states that share the same dependencies @attr [Array] dependencies the dependencies for this set of possibilities @attr [Array] possibilities the possibilities
trans-unit.target: 一个共享相同依赖关系的可能性状态的集合 @attr [Array]dependencies 这个可能性集合的依赖关系 @attr [Array]possibilities 可能性可能性

trans-unit.source: A combination of :integer and :float.
trans-unit.target: :integer 和 :float 的组合。

trans-unit.source: A command that is hidden in help messages but still invocable.
trans-unit.target: 一个隐藏在帮助信息中但仍可调用的命令。

trans-unit.source: A comment to be used for generating the certificate. The default is “Generated by Ruby/OpenSSL”
trans-unit.target: 用于生成证书的注释。默认值为“由Ruby / OpenSSL生成”

trans-unit.source: A complex number can be represented as a paired real number with imaginary unit; a+bi. Where a is real part, b is imaginary part and i is imaginary unit. Real a equals complex a+0i mathematically.
trans-unit.target: 复数可以表示为带虚单位的配对实数;a+bi。其中a为实部,b为虚部,i为虚单位。实数a在数学上等于复数a+0i。

trans-unit.source: A complex object is either an exact or an inexact number.
trans-unit.target: 一个复杂的对象要么是精确数,要么是不精确数。

trans-unit.source: A composite IPv6 address Regexp.
trans-unit.target: 复合 IPv6 地址 Regexp 。

trans-unit.source: A concrete implementation of Delegator, this class provides the means to delegate all supported method calls to the object passed into the constructor and even to change the object being delegated to at a later time with #__setobj__.
trans-unit.target: Delegator 的具体实现，此类提供了将所有受支持的方法调用委托给传递给构造函数的对象的方法，甚至可以稍后通过#__setobj__更改要委托给的对象。

trans-unit.source: A condition in a case expression. See control expressions
trans-unit.target: case 表达式中的条件。查看控制表达式

trans-unit.source: A conflict that the resolution process encountered @attr [Object] requirement the requirement that immediately led to the conflict @attr [{String,Nil=>}] requirements the requirements that caused the conflict @attr [Object, nil] existing the existing spec that was in conflict with
trans-unit.target: 解决过程遇到@attr [Object]的冲突要求立即导致冲突的要求@attr [{String，Nil =>}]要求导致冲突的要求@attr [Object，nil]存在现有规范与之冲突

trans-unit.source: A contrived pattern to match a number with optional decimal places:
trans-unit.target: 一个人为的模式,以匹配一个带有可选小数位的数字。

trans-unit.source: A convenience method for TracePoint.new, that activates the trace automatically.
trans-unit.target: TracePoint.new 的一种便捷方法，该方法可以自动激活跟踪。

trans-unit.source: A convenience method that's only available when the you require the IRB::XMP standard library.
trans-unit.target: 一个方便的方法,只有当你需要IRB::XMP标准库时才可用。

trans-unit.source: A convenience method to access the values like a Hash
trans-unit.target: 一种方便的方法来访问值，例如 Hash

trans-unit.source: A convenience method which is same as follows:
trans-unit.target: 一种方便的方法,它与下面的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: A convenience method, like object_group, but also reformats the Object's object_id.
trans-unit.target: 方便的方法，例如 object_group ，还可以重新格式化Object的object_id。

trans-unit.source: A converter list: an array of converter procs, converter names, and converter lists.
trans-unit.target: 转换器列表:转换器程序、转换器名称和转换器列表的数组。

trans-unit.source: A converter may be given a name and stored in a structure where the parsing methods can find it by name.
trans-unit.target: 转换器可以被赋予一个名称,并存储在一个结构中,解析方法可以通过名称找到它。

trans-unit.source: A converter name: the name of a stored converter.
trans-unit.target: 转换器名称:存储的转换器的名称。

trans-unit.source: A converter proc can receive a second argument, field_info, that contains details about the field. This modified strip_converter displays its arguments:
trans-unit.target: 转换器proc可以接收第二个参数 field_info ，该参数包含有关字段的详细信息。修改后的 strip_converter 显示其参数：

trans-unit.source: A converter proc: executable code to be used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换器proc:用于转换的可执行代码。

trans-unit.source: A cookie or cookies, returned as one or more Set-Cookie headers. The value can be the literal string of the cookie; a CGI::Cookie object; an Array of literal cookie strings or Cookie objects; or a hash all of whose values are literal cookie strings or Cookie objects.
trans-unit.target: 一种或多种Cookie，作为一个或多个Set-Cookie标头返回。该值可以是Cookie的文字字符串；一个 CGI::Cookie 对象；文字Cookie字符串或 Cookie 对象的 Array ；或所有值均为文字Cookie字符串或 Cookie 对象的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: A created socket is bound to interface_address. If you use IPv4 multicast then the interface of interface_address is used as the inbound interface. If interface_address is omitted or nil then '0.0.0.0' or '::1' is used.
trans-unit.target: 创建的套接字绑定到 interface_address 。如果使用IPv4组播，则将interface_address的 interface_address 用作入站接口。如果省略 interface_address 或为nil，则使用'0.0.0.0'或':: 1'。
